mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_activity_plan where activity_id=#{id} and (NOW( ) BETWEEN start_time AND end_time)

SELECT a.id, a.name, s.id as shop_id, m.id as seller_id, s.shop_name as shop_name, m.merchant_name as merchant_name, ap.prize_type, u.name as manager_id, a.is_delete, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.remark FROM inno72_activity a LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = a.shop_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = s.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.activity_id = a.id LEFT JOIN inno72_user u ON u.id =a.manager_id where a.is_delete = 0 and a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
SELECT a.id,a.name FROM inno72_activity a where a.is_delete = 0 and a.id not in (SELECT activity_id from inno72_activity_plan )
